project.name: MIS project
project.description: 提供前端網頁架構函式功能及說明

Graph-Editor.name: Graph-Editor
Graph-Editor.description:
### 提供一 GUI 編輯 Graph 的工具

基本操作:
- `ctrl + left_click`: 新增**點**
- Hold `ctrl` and drag line from one vertex to another one: 修改**線**
- `shift + left_click`: 修改**點/線**
- `left_click`: 選取**點/線**
- Select vertex/edge and `DELETE`: 刪除**點/線**

Restful-API-method.name: Restful-API-method
Restful-API-method.description: ### 提供與 Titan 溝通的一些方法

classitems.description: update force layout (called automatically each iteration)
classitems.name: tick

classitems.description:
Update force_graph (called when needed)
- Show tooltips when mouseover
- Handle create/edit/delete of element
classitems.name: restart
exportJSON

classitems.description: 取得 Titan Graph DataBase 列表
classitems.name: getGraphList
example:
```json
{
	version: "2.6.0",
	name: "Rexster: A Graph Server",
	graphs: [
		"cht_5000",
		"target_graph",
		"match_graph"
	],
	queryTime: 0.231863,
	upTime: "0[d]:10[h]:35[m]:20[s]"
}
```

classitems.description: 取得某 Titan Graph DataBase 全部的元素
classitems.name: getAllElement
example:
getAllElement(graph_name, "edges")
```json
{
 "version": "2.6.0",
 "results": [
   {
     "賣家(統編)": "!1",
     "買家(統編)": "!2",
     "_id": "syjgg-iagao-abdh-iaghs",
     "_type": "edge",
     "_outV": 30720768,
     "_inV": 30721024,
     "_label": "交易關係"
   }
 ],
 "totalSize": 1,
 "queryTime": 5.19161
}
```

classitems.description: 用特定 key-value 取得某 Graph DataBase 的元素
classitems.name: getElementValue

classitems.description: 在特定 Graph DataBase 執行 GremlinScript
classitems.name: executeGremlinScript

classitems.description: 在特定 Graph DataBase 執行 GremlinScript, 包含 results 的個數
classitems.name: executeGremlinScriptAndTotal

classitems.description: 在特定 Graph DataBase 新增 vertices
classitems.name: createVertex

params.name: new_vertex
params.description: A key-value pairs json that contain all infomations of new vertiex

classitems.description: 在特定 Graph DataBase 新增 edge
classitems.name: createEdge

params.name: new_edge
params.description: A key-value pairs json that contain all infomations of new edge

example:
createEdge(graph_name, "edges", {new_edge})
```json
{
   "version": "2.6.0",
   "results": {
       "發票統編": "ban1412",
       "單價": "10",
       "商品名稱": "123",
       "總金額": "1000",
       "發票細項序號": "1",
       "賣家(統編)": "14789632",
       "數量": "100",
       "買家(統編)": "!2",
       "_id": "syjpc-iah34-abdh-iaghs",
       "_type": "edge",
       "_outV": 30721792,
       "_inV": 30721024,
       "_label": "交易關係"
   },
   "queryTime": 71.084928
}
```
